text: viśvāsigaḷē, śaitānana hejje gurutugaḷannu anusarisabēḍi. Śaitānanu tanna hejjegurutugaḷannu anusarisuvavarige anaitika hāgū duṣṭa kelasagaḷannu ādēśisuttāne. Nim'ma mēle allāhana anugraha hāgū avana kr̥pe illade iddiddare, nim'malli yārobbarū endigū śud'dha śīladavarāgi uḷidiruttiralilla. Nijavāgi allāhanē tānicchisidavarannu śud'dhavāgiḍuttāne mattu allāhanu ellavannū kēḷuvavanu hāgū ellavannū ballavanāgiddāne
